name: Tricksters of Legend
description:
Here's my entry for the Touhou Fan Game Jam 5.

Features two of Gensokyo's oldest, most well-known tricksters, Tewi Inaba and Mamizou Futatsuiwa, facing off.

CREDITS LIST:
